AI Description: posix2ime is a software tool that converts POSIX timestamp to IME-mode timestamp in Linux systems. It is particularly useful for converting timestamps in the Input Method Editor (IME) mode, commonly used for inputting non-Latin characters in Asian languages.
Core Features: Converts Posix Timestamp To Ime-Mode Timestamp, Facilitates Conversion Of Timestamps In Input Method Editor (Ime) Mode, Designed For Linux Systems
General Tags: Timestamp Conversion, Linux Software, Ime-Mode Timestamp
